Author: penguin4glte
Name: Auto Retainer Sell List
Description: Configure a list of items to maintain on sale at (lowest market price - 1 gil)
Changelog:
# Release Notes

## New Features

- **Save/Cancel functionality in Settings Window**: Changes to retainer sell lists are now tracked and require explicit confirmation before being saved. Save and Cancel buttons appear when modifications are made, giving users full control over their changes.
  - Green "Save Changes" button to commit modifications
  - Red "Cancel" button to discard unsaved changes
  - Automatic change detection when adding, removing, or modifying items
  - Unsaved changes are automatically discarded when switching between retainers

## Improvements

- **Settings Window UI refinements**:
  - Replaced text-based settings button with an icon button for a cleaner interface
  - Removed the "Actions" column from the settings window for better layout
- **Processing optimization**: Empty retainers are now skipped during automated processing, improving overall efficiency

## Changes

- Settings modifications are no longer saved immediately - users must click "Save Changes" to persist their edits
